show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content: Hosts Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips﻿ take on issues of free speech and censorship, banned books, and much more. Greg Lukianoff﻿ of the Foundation for Individual Rights in Education﻿ (FIRE) discusses his new book Freedom From Speech concerning free speech on college campuses; Mark Crispin Miller﻿ talks about the latest re releases coming out in his Forbidden Bookshelf series; Graeme MacQueen discusses his new book The 2001 Anthrax Deception: The Case for Domestic Conspiracy; and the show closes with an update from Michael Levitin﻿ on the People’s Climate March events on 9/21 around the US.
